Title: Authorizes towns to establish community preservation funds
Summary: Authorizes designated cities and towns, beyond those in Putnam and Westchester counties, to establish community preservation funds and expands preservation of community character to include open space and water resources.
LawCode: Add §6-w, Gen Muni L; add Art 33-C §§1575 - 1588, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to authorizing designated cities and towns to establish community preservation funds; and to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing towns to impose a real estate transfer tax with revenues therefrom to be deposited in such community preservation funds
